H1.text: what is capital city of morocco. Casablanca

H2.text: what is capital city of morocco. Fez

H3.text: what is capital city of morocco. Rabat

A4.text: Rabat is the capital city of Morocco and the country's seventh-largest city with an urban population of approximately 580,000 (2014)

A5.text: Lyautey decided to relocate the country's capital from Fez to Rabat after the riots of 1912 following the Treaty of Fes

A6.text: Casablanca is the largest city of Morocco
